page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS.
page.content: {OLDWOOD COMMON SUB POST OFFICE. Situated in Berrington Lane about 0.5 KM. from junction of A4112 St. Michaels. Mail collected twice daily. {POST BOXES.}Four serve the area and are emptied morning and evening by Mail Van Drivers. 1.Salt Box Lane at junction with A4112 2.Oldwood Common near Fountain Inn. 3.On A4112 near Berrington Lane Junction. 4. Miles Hope Lane near A4112 junction {TELEPHONE KIOSKS.}Both Kiosks in hte area have Ten pence meters. 1. Near Fountain Inn, Oldwood Common. 2.In Berrington Lane opposite Dog House Inn. {RADIO PAGERS.}A few are carried by professional people. {TELEPHONES.}96% of houses have talephone installed.
